title: PRIVACY_BUDGETS view | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This feature requires Enterprise Edition (or higher). To inquire about upgrading, please contact Snowflake Support.

This Account Usage view lets you retrieve the privacy budgets associated with
privacy policies in an account.
For more information about viewing privacy budgets, see View a privacy budget.
Database that contains the privacy policy.
Schema that contains the privacy policy.
Name of the privacy budget in the privacy policy.
Organization and account where users executed queries that incurred privacy loss.
Cumulative privacy loss since the last time the privacy budget was refreshed.
Latency for the view may be up to 24 hours.

A privacy budget only appears if analysts associated with the privacy budget have incurred privacy loss or if an administrator has
reset the privacy budget.
